ygData.subject: Re: Dual Weild and weapons used - need advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Dual wield is much more profiecient if you use faster weaopns, since you ll get more swings, thus more chances to hit, thus more over all damage.  Fine Steel
ygData.messageBody:
Dual wield is much more profiecient if you use faster weaopns, since you'll get more swings, thus more chances to hit, thus more over all damage. Fine Steel long swords or FS scimitars are very nice and you can get them pretty cheap if you make a little trip down to cazic thule.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> <suzkim@...> 5.22.99 7:32:15 AM >>>
From: suzkim@...

Greeting,

Finally made it to 15 *does a jig*.

Advice needed.

Have a Mino Axe and a bastard sword. both 8dmg and 32/35.

Keep this combination of weapons?
If not, which should I switch?
Does it matter which is in my primary had?

Trying to save most of my monies for some banded armor so maybe some
advice on what to get now and what to get later?

I noticed that this dual wield takes a lot of stamina. Any magical item
to help that out? Or is it something I shouldn't worry about?

Thanks,

*hugs*

Azlana
